name: Start
intro: You're finally awake from your cryosleep. You may not remember, but you're on a ship headed for Earth. As resources are running low, the rest of the crew remains preserved in their cryopods. You alone are responsible for guiding me to get the ship home safely to Earth to deliver cargo that is crucial for the planet's survival.

name: Asteroids
intro: We are approaching a dangerous asteroid belt. You can choose to avoid the asteroids, but that will take time, perhaps too much time. Navigating through the belt is more direct, but there is much greater risk of damage. What do you think?

name: Asteroids-Avoid
intro: We avoided immediate danger by taking the longer, but safer, route around the asteroid belt. However, fuel has reached a critical level. We need to make a decision or we won't make it.

name: Asteroids-Direct
intro: You have chosen to find a direct route through the dangerous asteroid belt. However, we are sustaining heavy damage to our shields. I don't believe we are going to make it at this rate without some drastic measures.

name: Earth
intro: Our mission has succeeded! You have saved the day by delivering the cargo to Earth just in time. I approve of your strategic thinking.
